text: Bolitoglossa is a genus of salamanders. They are also called tropical climbing salamanders and web-footed salamanders. They are part of the Plethodontidae family. They live in Central America and South America. They are terrestrial amphibians. ==Species== 117 species are currently assigned to this genus. {|style="text-align:left; border:1px solid #999999; " Binomial Name and Author Common Name B. adspersa
